section.p: The ghost leaps high into the air with a boom like lightning rebounding off a tree. Jiro steps forward to interpose himself in front of the Lord Chancellor, but the ghost dispatches him with a hellfire bolt.
You watch in horror as the smoking carcass falls to the ground at Kiyomori’s feet.
‘Time to die, chancellor,’ cackles Akugenda’s voice.
Kiyomori stares at the ghost. ‘Do your worst.’

choices.choice: Drive the ghost off with prayer
